label: NSA Type 2/1 Encryption
quote: National Security Agency (NSA) Type 2 or Type 1 encryption.

label: PKI per DHS 4300A
quote: Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) (please see DHS 4300A Policy Directive (Version 13.3, February 13, 2023) attachment U).

label: Government Access for Security Reviews
quote: The Contractor shall afford DHS, including the organization of the DHS Office of the Chief Information Officer, the Office of the Inspector General, authorized Contracting Officer’s Technical Representative (COTR), and other government oversight organizations, access to the Contractor’s facilities, installations, operations, documentation, databases and personnel used in the performance of this contract.

label: Coordinate Security Reviews with CISO
quote: The Contractor will contact the DHS Chief Information Security Officer to coordinate and participate in the review and inspection activity of government oversight organizations external to the DHS.

label: Hardware, Software, and Services Compliance with DHS 4300A
quote: All hardware, software, and services provided under this task order must be compliant with DHS 4300A Policy Directive (Version 13.3, February 13, 2023).

label: Encryption Compliance with FIPS 197 AES 256 and FIPS 140-2
quote: FIPS 197 (Advanced Encryption Standard (AES)) 256 algorithm and cryptographic modules that have been validated under FIPS 140-2.

label: NSA Type 2/1 Encryption
quote: National Security Agency (NSA) Type 2 or Type 1 encryption.

label: PKI per DHS 4300A
quote: Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) (please see DHS 4300A Policy Directive (Version 13.3, February 13, 2023) attachment U).
